title: The Strict Umi-chan
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Waaaah, waaaah<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Waaaah, waaaah.... *Peek*<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>You can cry all you want, but it won’t do. I’m not as nice as other Nijigaku members. I firmly tell people that they shouldn’t do things that they shouldn’t. I treat Honoka the same way<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Uuu, Kasumin is sorry.... but~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>If you are sorry, then there are no buts. I know you’re a good girl, Kasumi. I’ll forgive you if you properly reflect on your actions<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>....You consider Kasumin to be a good girl, Umi-senpai?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Of course. Whoever tries to prank everyone by hiding their shoes, only to find that they’re unexpectedly dirty and took to washing all of them is a good girl<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Noooooo! Why do you know that! Who did you hear that from!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>If you want to know who, then you have to properly be sorry<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin is sorryyyyy! So please tell me who--!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
